summary: Expand Dini.Verse into an online gaming platform and game creation ecosystem, including a Dini Studio creation tool, and update the UI to include platform navigation for Home, Discover, Avatar Shop, Create, and Dini Bucks.
architectural_notes: Project must be a real, functional website (not a simulation or mockup).
Visual theme requirement updated: use a dark blue + white interface for the main UI (overrides prior guidance to avoid blue/purple).

existing_features.title: Create a real, navigable multi-page web application branded as "Dini.Verse" that is clearly Roblox-inspired (home, discovery/browse, experience details, user profile) and is not presented as a mockup or simulation (i.e., all pages must be functional routes with working data flows and persisted state).

Implement authentication using Internet Identity and provide clear "Log in" and "Sign up" entry points in the UI. Treat "Sign up" as first-time account setup after Internet Identity login (create a Dini.Verse profile with username/display name and optional avatar).

Add an "Experiences" model and implement core platform flows: browse experiences, view experience details, and create/publish an experience for authenticated users (title, description, thumbnail image, and a launch target such as an internal experience page or a URL).
Create user profile pages that display the user’s Dini.Verse profile (username/display name, avatar if present) and show a list of experiences they published.

Provide a coherent, distinctive visual theme for Dini.Verse and apply it consistently across pages (typography, spacing, components, and layout). Avoid a blue/purple palette unless explicitly required; pick an alternative cohesive scheme.

Generate and include required brand assets (logo, favicon, and a hero/banner image) as static files and render them in the UI (do not fetch images via backend). Store generated assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the frontend.
Update the top navigation bar to include functional routes/buttons for: Home, Discover, Avatar Shop, Create, and Dini Bucks. Ensure the same destinations are available in the mobile menu.

Add new pages/routes for Avatar Shop, Create, and Dini Bucks with English user-facing text, using the existing app layout. Pages must render without errors and clearly indicate the section the user is in.

Redesign the Home page UI to match a dark blue and white interface and to feature: the signed-in user’s avatar (or a sensible default when not available), a "Recommended" section, and a "Friend activity" section. These sections can be fed by existing data (e.g., experiences) and/or empty-states when the user is not signed in, but they must be present and styled per the dark blue/white direction.
Add a left-side navigation menu in the main app layout that is visible on desktop/tablet widths and contains links for: Profile, Inventory, Groups, and Settings.
Create functional routes/pages for Inventory, Groups, and Settings and wire them into the router and the new left-side menu.
Update the Discover page to support browsing trending games across categories, including at least: Adventure, Roleplay, and Simulator.

Update the experience publishing flow so creators can choose a category (Adventure/Roleplay/Simulator at minimum) when publishing an experience, and ensure it is stored and used by Discover category browsing.
Enhance the Experience Details page to display: a prominent green "Play" button, the experience description, a player count display, and thumbs up/down rating controls with counts.

During the in-page play mode for an experience, display standard gameplay controls guidance: WASD to move, Space to jump, Mouse to control the camera, and allow per-experience customization of this controls text.
Add an in-game menu UI during play mode with options to Leave, Reset Character, and Settings, accessible while the experience is in play mode.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a full website similar to Roblox branded as "Dini.Verse" (not a mockup/simulation).
Add user authentication with login and sign-up flows.
Add an online gaming platform layer where users can play games made by other users.
Add a game creation system centered on "Dini Studio" so users can create their own games for the platform.
Update the home page to a dark blue and white interface featuring user avatar, recommended games, and friend activity.
Add top navigation bar buttons/routes: Home, Discover, Avatar Shop, Create, and Dini Bucks (virtual currency).
Add a "Dini Bucks" virtual currency section surfaced in navigation.
Add a left-side navigation menu with Profile, Inventory, Groups, and Settings sections.
Implement a Discover page that highlights trending games and supports browsing by categories (e.g., Adventure, Roleplay, Simulator).
Add a game/experience details view with a prominent green Play button, description, player count, and thumbs up/down ratings.
Define and display standard gameplay controls guidance (WASD movement, space jump, mouse camera), allowing per-game customization.
Add an in-game menu with options to Leave, Reset Character, and adjust Settings.

Extend the Experience data model to include category and basic public stats needed for the details page: player count and thumbs up/down counts, and provide backend methods to read/update these stats.

If upgrading persisted backend state is required due to Experience type changes, add a conditional backend migration that preserves existing users/experiences and backfills new Experience fields with defaults.
